field.label: Enable Maltrail Server
field.help: This will activate the Maltrail server. You can use this service to also collect data from remote Maltrail sensors.

field.label: Add Blocklist Alias
field.help: Adds firewall alias "BlocklistMaltrail" referencing Maltrail's "/fail2ban" IP list. You can use this alias to block IPs that Maltrail detected as malicious.

field.label: UI Listen Address
field.help: IP address the server UI listens on.

field.label: UI Listen Port
field.help: TCP port of the server UI.

field.label: Log Listen Address
field.help: IP address to listen to where sensors should send log. Leave blank if you run server and sensor on the same machine.

field.label: Log Listen Port
field.help: The UDP port of the log server. Leave blank if you run server and sensor on the same machine. The default when in use should be set to 8337.
